data.message:
Please can i have your opinion what you think of the Rap Lyrics my koleg come up 2:

Hi let me tell you a story when i went to buy ticket for my motherfucking train, and I know I got few loose screws in my brain but they told me I got to seat at the back with some goat and Irene I said fuck that Man I don’t mind a goat but  Irene  she’s insane, last time she try to rob a bank with gun and the crane but this did not end well for her as she end up punching a hole in the roof of the police station at the Times Sqare  . Now let’s go back to the train I sit back relax and I see Irene on a goat chasing after the carriage train, what the fuck she’s doing out there in the rain,and then it hit me she’s doing the same shit again, but this time without the crane and it’s not a bank it’s a train.
